entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
